A short information of the plea betwixt the town council of Lithgow, and Mr. James Kirkwood school-master there, whereof a more full account may perhaps come out hereafter Kirkwood, James, fl. 1698.
20 p.
s.n., [Edinburgh? : 1690?]
Caption title. Imprint from Wing. Imperfect; pages stained with print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
